item.title: Wells Fargo’s stock rises as analyst proclaims ‘good entry point’ for investors
item.description: RBC Capital says Wells Fargo’s stock is a good buy after the recent financial-stock selloff, though most bank stocks remain in the red.

item.title: I invested $4,000 in 2020 when the market crashed. It’s now worth $55,000 with 65% in Nvidia. Am I now in trouble?
item.description: “I’ve been disabled from anorexia and postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome for the past five years.”

item.title: Bessent downplays stock-market weakness
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Thursday said he’s “not concerned about a little bit of volatility.”

item.title: ‘Is it finally time to freak out?’ I’m in my 50s and worried about the $650K in my 401(k).
item.description: “The stock market is in a downward spiral.”

item.title: Oil prices tick lower as IEA warns trade tensions will undercut demand
item.description: Oil futures headed lower on Thursday after the International Energy Agency’s monthly report underscored worries that rising global trade tensions coul...
